title: Looking for B5-1 Ranked duo partnet
body:
Hi, Unfortunately i am in Bronze. I am looking to find a Ranked duo partner who could possibly help me get out of bronze, I don't mind their rank.
Wouldn't mind being in the same league as me as long as you can be the same/higher skill level as i am! Thanks :)

replies.body:
I have nothing against you asking for a duo partner, but consider this:

The system probably placed you in bronze because that's the rank you deserve (no offense). If you try and use someone with a high skill level than you to climb to a higher rank, you may as well drop back to bronze after a few games.

Once again, I don't have anything against your decision, but this is just my 2 cents. It may as well be worth nothing to you.

That said though, the bronzies can be the worst teammates. My provisional were shit because each game someone went AFK or intentionally fed. Having a partner is not bad, but to rely on them is a different story. We deserve good teamwork and good people with better attitudes than the salty and toxic people that we normally get.
I understand completely, Thanks for getting back to me! :)

hay mate i added you 
i wont carry you but i will teach you to play better if that is what you are looking for
